Plot: When 16 year old video game progeny, Zac Bushnell creates the highest selling game app "Ball", he is swept up by the video game company Sunomy to run the company and bring it up to the next level.
Title: Game On!
Writer: Marco Renzi, Ugo Ripamonti, Renato Sannio
Actors: Beau Rich, Kirk Bonacci, Erynne Bowers, Nadine Avola
